net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Class JsonCnd

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.JsonCnd

  • public final class JsonCnd
extends Object
    Methods and types used to encode/decode QNodeTypeDefinitions as JSON for use in checklists.
    See Also:
    DefinitionToken, NodeTypeDefinitionQAdapter

                                                                                    @NotNull
                                                                                    @NotNull org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.namespace.NamespaceMapping mapping)
        Read a serialized JSON CND into a list of qualified node type definitions.
        Parameters:
        json - the jcrNodetypes object, organized by "typeName": { node type definition }
        mapping - the mapping to use to resolve JCR namespaces from prefixes, see toNamespaceMapping(List)
        Returns:
        a list of qualified node type definitions
